New Records: Cade Cunningham notched his first triple-double of the regular season (17 points, 11 rebounds, 11 assists)
Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey led the charge with 26 points, six players went on to finish the game in double figures
The Pistons bench scored 27 points, while the Lakers bench scored 10 points
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons have secured their first winning streak of the season
The team will have an off day Tuesday before resuming action Wednesday against the Charlotte Hornets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons have more wins than the 76ers and Bucks combined
The Lakers lost to the Pistons on a random Monday night
Others: The Pistons were led by a balanced offensive attack for the second game in a row
